column2: Debugger: do not insert cast to runtime type for non java code fragments

column3: This may affect groovy, jsp, etc...
@gorrus I've just force pushed the pull-request. Now cast should be inserted for groovy, jps and others, but not for Kotlin (and maybe some others where java-like cast won't be parsed)
expression is cached, so if you switch the language it won't add casts as expected.
Do not insert cast in debugger if it produces error elements
